title: Envolve Foods Recalls Chicken and Beef Products due to Possible Salmonella and Listeria monocytogenes Contamination in Vegetables
summary: WASHINGTON, Oct. 19, 2018 Envolve Foods, a Corona, Calif. establishment, is recalling approximately 292,764 pounds of ready-to-eat chicken and beef products that contain a vegetable ingredient that may be contaminated with Salmonella and Listeria monocytogenes, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service...
